description: React component for a chat interface called MentorPage, providing career guidance based on user input and mentorResponses data.

methods.name: findBestMatch
methods.description: Finds the best matching key in mentorResponses for the user's query, returning the key and response object.

methods.name: handleSend
methods.description: Handles sending user input, finds the best match, and updates the chat messages with the mentor's response.

methods.name: handleKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key press events in the textarea, triggering send on Enter key.
